name: Nightline
desc: Confidential and non-advisory listening service for UEA students

desc: Confidential advice service for all UEA students

name: Samaritans
desc: Free confidential emotional support to people who are struggling with mental or physical health

name: Accommodation
desc: Provides information regarding accommodation on and off campus to students

name: Report and Support
desc: A confidential and safe space for students, staff, and visitors to report concerns about unacceptable behavior, such as bullying, harassment, or discrimination

name: Security
desc: The security team at UEA which deal with disturbances and protect students

name: Housing Advice
desc: Provides information to UEA students about living off campus

name: Disability Advice
desc: Provides information on support the university provides for students with disabilities

desc: The services available at the university for students struggling with mental health and need a counsellor

name: Clubs
desc: The list of Clubs available at UEA

name: Societies
desc: The list of societies available at UEA

name: Learning Enhancement Team
desc: The team at the university which are available if a student is struggling with their studies, they offer different types of support

name: Peer Assisted Learning Mentors
desc: Where another student on the same course as the struggling student tutors and helps them with work they find difficult

name: Student Support Services
desc: Provides information about all aspects of student life, and is there to answer any questions a student may have

name: UEA Student Support Services
desc: Provides information about all aspects of student life, and is there to answer any questions a student may have

name: Faith and Spirituality
desc: A community where people who are religious can go and practice their chosen religon

name: The Cruse Bereavement Charity
desc: Charity for people who have lost a loved one, focuses on grief

name: The Good Grief Trust
desc: Charity for people who have lost a loved one, focuses on grief

name: UEA Career Central
desc: Helps students with all aspects regarding getting a career post-university or securing an internship

name: UEA hardship fund
desc: A fund which helps students who are unable to afford food and other basic needs while studying at university

name: Access to Learning fund
desc: A fund which helps students who are unable to afford their studies and living costs due to family or personal circumstances

name: UEA financial Advice
desc: A team which offers basic financial advice to students, this could involve creating a simple budget

name: UEA bursaries and scholarships
desc: The lists of bursaries and scholarships the university provides to specific students

name: Sportspark
desc: The sports center of the university, contains the gym and other sporting facilities

name: Library
desc: The main library at the university

name: Career Central
desc: Helps students with all aspects regarding getting a career post-university or securing an internship

name: Study skills
desc: Helps students practice and implement better study skills

name: NHS Choices
desc: The NHS offers simple advice online

name: Medical centre
desc: The doctors which is on-campus available to all UEA students to become registered to

desc: A phoneline called for non-emergency medical queries, can also be online
